description: This Java class defines the 'Template' entity used in the invoice backend system. It models invoice/message template configurations, including properties such as id, partner reference, name, template type, content JSON, default flag, and timestamps for creation and update.

classes.name: Template
classes.description: Entity representing a message or invoice template with various configuration properties.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the template.

methods.name: getPartner
methods.description: Returns the partner associated with the template.

methods.name: setPartner
methods.description: Sets the partner associated with the template.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the template.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the template.

methods.name: getTemplateType
methods.description: Returns the type of the template.

methods.name: setTemplateType
methods.description: Sets the type of the template.

methods.name: getContentJson
methods.description: Returns the JSON content of the template.

methods.name: setContentJson
methods.description: Sets the JSON content of the template.

methods.name: isDefault
methods.description: Checks if the template is set as default.

methods.name: setDefault
methods.description: Sets whether the template is default.
